resources.string: Error installing database. Please try re-installing application.
This application is not licensed. Please purchase it from Android Market.
Unable to validate license. Check to see if a network connection is available.
Your exercise program was reset successfully
You did not complete all exercises. Tap YES to set this workout as completed, or NO to close this screen without completing the workout (so you can continue it later).
Tap START to start selected workout outside of Complete exercise program, or CANCEL.
You did not complete all exercises. Tap CLOSE to finish this workout, or CANCEL to continue.
Before you start, please enter following information:"
You can access it from Menu and input later
Enter the weight and number of repetitions performed till failure. This test should be performed with a spotter for reasons of safety.
VIEW PROGRAM CALENDAR AND WORKOUTS LOGS
FINISH WORKOUT AND GO TO HOME SCREEN
Unable to validate license. Check to see if a network connection is available. Please reinstall application if problem persists.
Set cardio machine to 5 mi (6 km) per hour
Remove all log entries for current workout?
Click YES to reset - all workout logs will be deleted and current day set to Block 1 Day 1. Are you sure this is what you want to do?
Click YES to remove all saved recommended weight values from all exercises, or CANCEL.
Click YES to remove saved recommended weight values from current exercise, or CANCEL.
No workout log found for this workout.
Target HR Zone 50–85% from Maximum heart rate

This calculator is more accurate than general hard rate calculator, but requires resting heart rate input. To accurately measure your resting heart rate: Count your pulse on your wrist or on the side of your neck prior to getting out of the bed in the morning. Count the number of beats, starting with zero, for one full minute. For accuracy, take your resting heart rate three mornings in a row and average the heart rates. Target HR Zone 50–85% from Maximum heart rate.
Start Rest timer on log save
Advance to the next exercise when recommended number of sets completed.
Prevent application from going to sleep mode when on Workout screen.
Seems that you already started this workout today. Tap YES if you would like to continue this workout and load saved logs. Tap NO to start new workout.
Please select correct month and year.
Are you sure you want to change your current day? Tap YES to change, or CANCEL.
Are you sure you want to close workout without completing it? Tap YES to close workout screen or CANCEL to continue.
Are you sure you want to close workout? Tap SAVE LOG & CLOSE to save workout log, CLOSE WITHOUT SAVING LOG to discard log, or CANCEL to continue workout.
Exercise program completed. Please select Reset Exercise Program from application Menu to set the program to beginning.

You did not save any laps. Are you sure you want to close workout? Tap CLOSE WITHOUT COMPLETING THE DAY to close workout so you can do it later, CLOSE & SET DAY COMPLETED to complete the day, or CANCEL to continue workout.

Choose how weight values are displayed in the weight input wheel. Select increment interval for weight input from INTERVAL dropdown and number from which weight will be incremented by interval value from INCREMENT START dropdown. For example, if Increment Interval set to 5 and Interval Start set to 15, your weight input values will be 1,2,3,4,...... 12,13,14,15,20,25,30, 35 and so on.
No playlists found. Please use your Media Playser application to create a playlist.
No music found. Please select music from your playlists.
No music found. Please tap SELECT PLAYLIST button to load music from your playlists.
Tap SELECT PLAYLIST to select Playlist to play. You can create and edit your Playlists using your Media Player application.
Seems that your device does not have SD card. Applications needs a SD card to play music.
Selected Playlist does not contain any music. Please add music to this playlist using your Media Player or select different playlist.
Seems that your device does not have camera
Please complete current exercise before starting next.
Are you sure you want to finish this exercise? You did not complete the time set. Tap DONE to finish or CONTINUE to continue.
Do you want to close the application?
Seems that application does not have permission to start music service on your device.
Error loading playlist. Please try again or create new play list using your Media Player application.
Error starting application. Please re-install if problem persists.
Sorry, error reading workout information. Please try again.
Sorry, error updating log. Please try again.
Sorry, error reading data. Please try again.
Error saving log. Please try again.
Error saving log - please input weight.
No laps completed - nothing to save. Tap FINISH WORKOUT to close, or CONTINUE to continue.
Error saving log. Tap FINISH WORKOUT to close workout, or CONTINUE to continue workout and try again.
Error processing data - Invalid workout mode. Please try again.
Sorry, error reading next workout information. Please try to set workout Complete from the workout list, or reset the exercise program if you completed it.
Unable to perform selected action because permissions were not granted.
Status update posted from Commando Fit app.

You should consult with your doctor before starting any exercise program. Application and its contents are made available without warranties or guarantees of any kind and application vendor disclaims any liability for any type or form of injury, including personal, or damage of any kind or type resulting from the use of this application. This includes personal physical injury from performing any exercise described, or any and all forms of injury and/or damage to person, both animate or inanimate, mental, physical, electronic or any and other form of injury currently described or that may be described in the future in any medical dictionary, law books, fitness and training informational sources, and any and all other sources.
